title: Launch Max para Maldo
description: WhatsApp assistant for Maldo Distributors. Automated cron jobs configured: (1) Hourly usage monitoring with spike detection, (2) Daily price checks in silent mode (9 AM PR time) collecting baseline data on 10 assumed products. Launch completed Feb 21 9 AM - welcome messages sent to Jorge & Karla. Next: get real product list from client.

subtasks.title: Send welcome messages to Jorge & Karla
Get real product list from client

title: Fix Discord 401 Unauthorized errors
description: Discord bot token expired/invalid. Currently affecting: Vic Saturday Escalation (401 error). Most jobs now working (Morning Brief, Fitness briefs recovered), but Vic-related jobs still failing. Fix: (1) Go to https://discord.com/developers/applications, (2) Select bot application, (3) Bot tab → Reset Token, (4) Copy new token, (5) Run: openclaw gateway config.patch and update channels.discord.token, (6) Gateway will auto-restart. Last checked: Feb 22 12 PM - partial recovery, Vic jobs still broken.

title: Fix GitHub Workspace Backup timeout
description: Nightly GitHub backup cron job timing out. Attempted fix (300s timeout) did not resolve the issue - still timing out. Job shows 300s in config but execution fails with 'cron: job execution timed out'. Need different approach - possibly: (1) Split git operations, (2) Add git config for timeout handling, (3) Use git add with pathspec instead of -A, (4) Optimize large files with .gitattributes. Last failure: Feb 22 11 PM (consecutive errors: 1). Workspace is still backed up via Mission Control daily nightly job, so no data loss risk. Status: Active investigation.

title: Fix Fitness Dashboard Health Check model error
description: Cron job 'Fitness Dashboard Health Check' was failing with 'Unknown model: anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-6'. Fixed by updating job payload to use correct model (anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929). Job now running successfully every 6 hours. Verified Feb 22 12 PM.

title: Agent Readiness Auditor MVP
description: Build free audit checklist, reach out to 10 companies. Potential $5-7.5K quick win.

title: Mission Control UI overhaul
description: Better aesthetics, fix docs display, improve readability. Sprint 1 complete (Feb 22 5 AM): Added data freshness indicators with color-coded status dots, 'last updated' timestamps on all major sections, and manual refresh button. Dashboard now feels alive instead of stale. Next: Sprint 2 (progress indicators, recent wins), Sprint 3 (visual polish), Sprint 4 (motivational intelligence).

title: Gateway Token Mismatch (RESOLVED)
description: Gateway was returning 'unauthorized: device token mismatch' error blocking all automation. Successfully resolved via gateway restart at ~3 AM Feb 21. Token rotation completed. System back online, but some cron jobs now showing different errors (see Task #15).

title: Claude usage optimization & monitoring
description: Automated hourly usage checks with spike detection (>10%/hr alerts, >20%/3hr acceleration alerts, >80% threshold warnings). Currently using ~22% weekly. Maldo automation configured to use ~10% weekly. Goal: maximize value from Max plan subscription.

title: Dashboard fixes: Usage display + Recent docs
description: Fixed Claude usage not showing (added public/data sync) and docs not showing latest files (sorted ALL files by date, not just last 10). Auto-sync script runs hourly with usage cron job.

title: Setup GitHub Workspace Backup
description: Automated daily backup of workspace to private GitHub repo. Cron job running nightly at 11 PM. Protects client data with disaster recovery.

title: Add workflow orchestration rules to Max
description: Updated SOUL.md with engineering best practices: plan mode default, subagent strategy, self-improvement loop, verification requirements, elegance standards, and autonomous bug fixing. Created tasks/lessons.md and tasks/todo.md for tracking.

title: Apply engineering rules to main agent + create global standards
description: Created ENGINEERING.md as single source of truth for all agents. Both main and Maldo now reference it. Added tasks/ directory with lessons.md and todo.md for main agent tracking.

title: Fix docs display on production
description: Docs tab was empty on Render because workspace files aren't synced. Added graceful degradation: shows friendly empty state on prod, works fully on localhost.
